channel.title: Wut the hell did i do wrong?
channel.description:
i get dis error.
[code]NPCHandler.java:364: 'else' without 'if' else ^ NPCHandler.java:1187: illegal start of expression public boolean AttackNPCMage(int NPCID) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
wen i added this. [code]npcs[i].npcType == 912 || npcs[i].npcType == 913 || npcs[i].npcType == 145 || npcs.npcType == 795[/code]
above:
[code] AttackPlayerMage(i);[/code]
any1 help?

item.title: Wut the hell did i do wrong?
item.dc:creator: @fallen_darkness fallen darkness
item.description:
@fallen_darkness wrote:

i get dis error.

NPCHandler.java:364: 'else' without 'if' else ^ NPCHandler.java:1187: illegal start of expression public boolean AttackNPCMage(int NPCID) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

wen i added this.

npcs[i].npcType == 912  || npcs[i].npcType == 913 || npcs[i].npcType == 145 || npcs.npcType == 795

above:

AttackPlayerMage(i);

any1 help?

Read full topic
